[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /std/basic/club_listing.c

This is an inheritable for printing out different sorts of club listings.

See also:
/obj/handlers/club_handler.c and /std/room/club_control_room.c

Written by Pinkfish

Started Sat Oct 24 02:28:04 EDT 1998

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/player_handler.h, /include/am_time.h, /include/broadcaster.h and /include/clubs.h

Method index

club_info(string, int, string)
This method prints out the information associated with the club.
club_info_string(string, int, string)
This method returns the club information as a string.
club_list(string, int, function)
This method prints out a list of the current clubs.
club_members(string, int, string)
This method prints out all the members of the club, or all the members of the club online.
family_info(string, string)
This method prints out the information associated with the family.
family_info_string(string, string)
This method returns the family information as a string.
person_in_control(object)
This method returns the player in control of the item.
player_relationships_string(string)
This method returns the relations that the specified player has as a string.
sort_and_capitalise(string *)
This method will sort and capitalise the array of strings sent into the method.
www_club_info_string(string, int, string)
This method returns the club information as a html string.
www_club_list(string, int, int, int)
This method prints out a list of the current clubs into html.
www_family_info_string(string, string)
This method returns the family information as a string.
www_finger_name(string)
This method turns a name into a fingerable name.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
player_relationships_string
string player_relationships_string(string player)
This method returns the relations that the specified player has as a string. It will return a blank string if the player has no relationships.

Parameters:
player - the player to check relationships for

Protected Functions

These are functions that only objects inheriting the class can access.

club_info
int club_info(string name,
int show_election,
string person)
This method prints out the information associated with the club. The stuff printed out here is directly lifted from the club control room. This method is designed to work with add_command().

Parameters:
name - the name of the club to show the information about
show_election - if non-zero show the election information
person - the person who is showing the information
Returns:
1 on success, 0 on failure
club_info_string
string club_info_string(string name,
int show_election,
string person)
This method returns the club information as a string.

Parameters:
name - the name of the club to show the information about
show_election - if non-zero show the election information
person - the person who is showing the information
Returns:
the club information string, 0 if no information
See also:
club_info()
club_list
int club_list(string person,
int print_families,
function check_list)
This method prints out a list of the current clubs.

Parameters:
person - the person who is doing the listing
print_families - 1 print the families, 0 print the clubs
check_list - this function is called to see if the club should be listed
Returns:
0 on failure and 1 for success
See also:
club_info(), club_members(), www_club_list() and www_club_info()
club_members
int club_members(string club,
int online,
string person)
This method prints out all the members of the club, or all the members of the club online. This method is designed to work with add_command().

Parameters:
club_name - the name of the club to print the members of
online - print only the online members, 0 not online, 1 online, 2 online and listening to the club channel
Returns:
1 if successful, 0 if not
family_info
int family_info(string name,
string person)
This method prints out the information associated with the family. The stuff printed out here is directly lifted from the family control room. This method is designed to work with add_command().

Parameters:
name - the name of the family to show the information about
show_election - if non-zero show the election information
person - the person who is showing the information
Returns:
1 on success, 0 on failure
family_info_string
string family_info_string(string name,
string person)
This method returns the family information as a string.

Parameters:
name - the name of the family to show the information about
show_election - if non-zero show the election information
person - the person who is showing the information
Returns:
the family information string, 0 if no information
See also:
family_info()
person_in_control
object person_in_control(object ob)
This method returns the player in control of the item.

Parameters:
ob - the item
Returns:
the player in control
See also:
club_members()
sort_and_capitalise
string sort_and_capitalise(string * arr)
This method will sort and capitalise the array of strings sent into the method.

Parameters:
arr - the array to sort and capitalise
Returns:
the sorted and capitalised string
See also:
club_members()
www_club_info_string
string www_club_info_string(string name,
int show_election,
string person)
This method returns the club information as a html string.

Parameters:
name - the name of the club to show the information about
show_election - if non-zero show the election information
person - the person who is showing the information
Returns:
the club information string, 0 if no information
See also:
club_info()
www_club_list
string www_club_list(string person,
int print_families,
int start,
int show)
This method prints out a list of the current clubs into html.

Parameters:
person - the person who is doing the listing
print_families - 1 print the families, 0 print the clubs
start - the index to start from
show - how many to show
Returns:
the club listing string
See also:
club_info(), club_members(), www_club_list() and www_club_info()
www_family_info_string
string www_family_info_string(string name,
string person)
This method returns the family information as a string.

Parameters:
name - the name of the family to show the information about
show_election - if non-zero show the election information
person - the person who is showing the information
Returns:
the family information string, 0 if no information
See also:
family_info()
www_finger_name
string www_finger_name(string name)
This method turns a name into a fingerable name.

Parameters:
name - the name to make fingerable
Returns:
the htmlised name string
